时间限制的饮食与运动可能会增加脂肪的流失对于希望减肥的人们来说，时间限制的饮食是最新的热潮，但是它是否起作用仍然是燃烧卡路里的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/time-restriction-combine-combined-with-eccise-may-boost-fat-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/time-restriction-combined-combined-with-eccise-may-boost-fat-fat-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a830db4-3A92-42A9-92E7-7958A6A37F7A Wed, 26 Mar 2025 21:24:10 -0400 Time-restricted eating combined with exercise may boost fat loss

研究发现BRCA2在癌症治疗中的保护机制BRCA2中的突变（一种已知可修复受损的DNA并抑制肿瘤形成的基因）可以预测个体易于发展乳腺癌，卵巢癌，前列腺，胰腺和其他上皮肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-uncovers-protection-mechanism-of-brca2-in-cancer-wareatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-uncovers-protection-mechanism-of-brca2-in-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=708D0732-F71D-44A9-AB06-CA8FC81AE57F Wed, 26 Mar 2025 21:13:18 -0400 Study uncovers protective mechanism of BRCA2 in cancer treatment

通过（碘化的）盐：碘缺陷驱动糖尿病患者的脆弱风险较低的碘水平和非碘盐的使用与2型糖尿病患者的较高风险有关。这种关联在甲状腺功能障碍的患者中最强，强调了足够的碘摄入量的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/pass-the--iodized) salt-iodine-deficitional-deficity-drives-frailty-frailty-frailty-frailty-risk-inpeople-with-dibetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/pass-the--- iodized) salt-iodine-deficity-deficity-drives-frailty-frailty-frailty-frailty-risk-inpeople-with-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4948a63-4e68-4fa9-4fa9-a5db-f63e04bc6c18 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 21:07:00 -0400 Pass the (iodized) salt: Iodine deficiency drives frailty risk in people with diabetes
研究人员为非洲猪发烧病毒开发了反向遗传学系统J. Craig Venter研究所（JCVI），Friedrich-Loeffler-Institut（FLI）和国际牲畜研究所（ILRI）的研究人员开发了非洲猪发烧病毒（ASFV）的反向遗传学系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/researchers-develop--a-reverve-genetics-system-system-for-afor-afor-swine-swine-fever-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/researchers-develop--a-reverve-genetics-system-system-for-afor-afor-swine-swine-fever-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e80d5b59-9bf3-4b89-b13c-e8dafd47fbee Wed, 26 Mar 2025 21:02:15 -0400 Researchers develop a reverse genetics system for African swine fever virus

研究发现心脏功能障碍与较小的大脑体积之间的关联根据美国神经病学医学杂志在线上发表的荟萃分析，患有心脏问题早期迹象的人也可能会改变脑部健康的变化，这可能是痴呆症的早期迹象，例如脑部量的早期迹象，例如大脑体积的损失，例如2025年3月26日在线上的荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-finds-association-bet-heart-dysfunction-and-dysfunction-and-and-smaller-brain-brain-volumes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-finds-association-bet-heart-dysfunction-and-dysfunction-and-and-smaller-brain-brain-volumes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0163EE42-E579-4CC1-8080-7720A4D3158F Wed, 26 Mar 2025 20:42:57 -0400 Study finds association between heart dysfunction and smaller brain volumes
与更高痴呆症风险有关的邻里劣势根据美国神经病学医学杂志在线上发表的一项研究，居住在弱势社区中的人们可能比居住在缺点较少的社区的人们更有可能发展痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/neighborhood-disadvantage-to-to-to-higher-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/neighborhood-disadvantage-linked-to-to-to-to-to-to-higher-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70A198AB-D217-4D8E-BD68-BD68-BEE92471F020 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 20:37:33 -0400 Neighborhood disadvantage linked to higher dementia risk
科学家发现了稀有的基因变种，可以帮助人们生活超过100研究了2,000多名Ashkenazi犹太百岁老人的研究人员发现了两个与特殊寿命相关的IGF-1基因变体。这些变体通过减少的受体结合或下降的IGF-1水平来降低IGF-1受体活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/Scientists-uncover-rare-gene-gene-variants-th-help-people-live-past-past-100.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/scientist-uncover-rare-rare-gene-variants-th-help-people-live-live-past-past-100.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79b901f1-5F5D-4691-4691-AF0B-09B-09BC14A48018 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 20:37:00 -0400 Scientists uncover rare gene variants that help people live past 100
